column5: The Mininstry of Natural Resources is proposing to bring some kind of standardization to the fishing resources of the Province in 2007. They have a web page that includes a link at the bottom of the page that will take you into the full document. The web page for the basic explanation is www.ene.gov.on.ca/envregistry/027028ex.htm They have a deadline for comments of May 1 2006 so make your feelings known.
Just a reminder that the deadline for comments on proposed regulation changes is fast approaching, if you have a concern on the changes, now is the time to act by submitting your concerns.
